qualifiers.applicability: All below-grade patios on a lot

dimensional.name: combined area of all below-grade patios
dimensional.value: 2% of the lot area or 200 sf

specs.name: measurements
specs.condition: based on interior dimension of opening

mandatory: Below-grade patios may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.
Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.

explicit_deviations: Area devoted to required stairway egress shall not be included in the 200 sf limitation.

cross_references: Figure 40: Examples of site plan w/below-grade patios
logical_dependencies: a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
